title: What's cute, spins around in circles and gets redder by the second?

replies.body:
Reminds me of an episode of Happy Tree Friends...

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/happytreefanon/images/3/39/Blender.png/revision/latest?cb=20121127235117
Oh... Twisted sense of humor has been checked. I remember that "show".
Thanks for bringing nightmares back from when i was younger
Let me guess... Writer of Yordle lore ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

http://40.media.tumblr.com/b5db3073ecea09b64d568f3b1725d353/tumblr_nhn5j5ftjy1u736ryo2_r1_500.png
SHURIMA
Casual Azir must be like the best thing.
https://j.gifs.com/82yznm.gif
Can you do this with every champion in the game? Looking at Teemo getting Annihilated brings a wonderful smile to my soul.
I didn't make that lol

Aright my turn,
Who's curvy, redheaded, has a scar, the biggest chest, and looks great in tights. 

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/321a96f6027fff95e47bf2d854e9da71.png
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/walkingdead/images/3/3f/Shut-up-and-take-my-money.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/640?cb=20140829235648

I was thinking a Poro in a blender.

Because this {{champion:17}} is not cute. He's a freaking potato.
My penis
If she says "it's cute"....

You stick your penis inside blenders?

Whatever gets you off, I guess.
Jeezus man
To be fair, we don't know for sure if they have red blood.
Ult and kill teemo with Darius. you will see red blood popping out
You also see it with Champions that don't have blood. I'm pretty sure it's just Darius dousing his enemies with Ketchup to scare the minions.

That's super metal.

Oh, not the joke, I was talking about the spokes of the blender, I'm surprised it could chop up Poppy and her armor.
lmao didn't expect that
I was gonna guess Katarina
Thought it was gonna be Katarina

Katarina is sexy, not cute.
Sexy>cute!!!

I'm dissapointed. I was hopping for this

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8i2OVqWo9s0

>What's cute, spins around in circles and gets redder by the second?

Photons that are moving away from us at near light speeds.
If you don't think photons are cute and
http://img.pandawhale.com/106623-bill-nye-the-science-guy-meme-ChUW.jpeg

Let's make this a thing!

Why is there a bleeding Yordle split in two?

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/CbnLA7ZrMZw/maxresdefault.jpg

Because they axed Darius a question.
I was thinking of Gnar or Katarina :/
More like, a {{champion:17}}  in a blender, amirite?
Ouch, that's going to hurt a little.
"Garen covered in the blood of his enemies" was what I was expecting
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Me when Rengar does that  spinny thing.
(0_0)
{{champion:86}}
Yay, as long as the blender is made of pure metal and replace the yordle with 10 poros.
nice, esp if its teemo or kennen or fizz
